name: brave-bird
effect: Inflicts regular damage. User takes 1/3 the damage it inflicts in recoil.
short_effect: User receives 1/3 the damage inflicted in recoil.

flavor_text.sword_shield: The user tucks in its wings and charges from a low altitude. This also damages the user quite a lot.
flavor_text.legends_arceus: The user tucks in its wings and charges at a low altitude. This also damages the user.
